welcome.title: Hi! I am the Better Saved Messages bot.
welcome.description:
You can use me as your regular Saved Messages chat, but I can do more!

Log in to your Google Drive account and I will keep a detailed log of all your messages, as well as download and save all your attachments to a folder on your Google Drive.

help.text:
Here's what I can do:

- Send me any text message, and I'll save it to your Google Sheets
- Send me images, videos, audio, PDFs, and other files to save them to your Google Drive
- Use /start to get started
- Use /user to see your user information
- Use /connect_drive to connect your Google Drive
- Use /disconnect_drive to revoke Drive access
- Use /fix_spreadsheet if you're having issues saving messages
- Use /nuke_user to completely delete your account data
- Use /help to see this message again

messages.connect_drive_required: If you want your messages to be saved to your Google Drive, you need to connect your Google Drive account first. Use /connect_drive to get started. You can still use this without a Drive connection just as you would your regular Saved Messages.
messages.unsupported_attachment:
I'm a very young bot and I can't deal with {attachment_type}{document_info} attachments yet.

In the future, I'll be able to save {attachment_type} files to your Google Drive, but for now, please send text messages only.
messages.no_drive_token: You need to connect your Google Drive first using /connect_drive.
messages.drive_connected: ✅ Successfully connected to Google Drive! Your messages will now be saved to your Google Drive.
messages.drive_disconnected: ✅ Successfully disconnected Google Drive. Your messages will no longer be saved to Google Drive.
messages.drive_not_connected: You don't have Google Drive connected. Use /connect_drive to connect it.
messages.auth_code_required: Please send me the authorization code you received from Google.
messages.auth_code_invalid: Invalid authorization code. Please try the /connect_drive command again.
messages.auth_error: An error occurred while connecting to Google Drive: {error}
messages.nuke_confirmation: ⚠️ WARNING: This will delete ALL your data! ⚠️ This action will: - Disconnect your Google Drive - Delete all your messages from our database - Remove all your files from Google Drive This cannot be undone! Type 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT' to confirm.
messages.nuke_cancelled: Account deletion cancelled. Your data is safe.
messages.nuke_success: Your account and all associated data have been deleted. Thank you for using BetterSaved!
messages.fix_spreadsheet_success: Spreadsheet information has been fixed. You should now be able to save messages again.
messages.fix_spreadsheet_error: An error occurred while fixing the spreadsheet: {error}
messages.file_uploaded: ✅ File saved to Google Drive: {file_name} 🔗 Open in Drive
messages.file_upload_error: ❌ Error saving file to Google Drive: {error}
messages.message_saved: 💾 Message saved to Google Sheets 🔗 Open in Google Sheets

disconnect.confirmation: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to disconnect Google Drive? This will: • Stop saving new messages to Google Drive • Revoke this app's access to your Google account • Not delete any files already saved to your Google Drive You can reconnect at any time with /connect_drive.
disconnect.success: ✅ Your Google Drive has been disconnected. Your messages will no longer be saved to Google Drive.
disconnect.error: ❌ Failed to disconnect your Google Drive. Please try again later.
disconnect.not_connected: ❌ You don't have Google Drive connected.

nuke_user.confirmation: ⚠️ DANGER ZONE - ACCOUNT DELETION ⚠️ You are about to delete your account and all associated data from BetterSaved. This action cannot be undone! • All your settings will be deleted • Your Google Drive connection will be removed • Your saved preferences will be lost Note: This will NOT delete any files already saved to your Google Drive. To confirm deletion, type 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT' (without quotes).
nuke_user.success:
💥 Your account has been successfully deleted. All your data has been removed from our system.

If you change your mind, you can always start fresh by sending /start again.
nuke_user.error: ❌ An error occurred while trying to delete your account. Please try again later.
nuke_user.cancelled: Account deletion cancelled. Your data remains safe and unchanged.
nuke_user.no_account: ❌ You don't have an account to delete.

errors.unauthorized: ❌ You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.not_implemented: ❌ This feature is not implemented yet.
errors.invalid_command: ❌ Invalid command. Use /help to see available commands.
errors.rate_limited: ⚠️ You're doing that too fast. Please try again in a few seconds.
